title: cubeR
code: library(cubeR)  # Puts Feliks Zemdegs' data in a variable x <- get_person_data("2009ZEMD01")  # Gets the "person_data" tibble specifically x <- x$person_data  # Print print(x) # A tibble: 1 × 7   Name           ID         Avatar   From  Gender Competitions Completed_Solves 1 Feliks Zemdegs 2009ZEMD01 https:/… " Au… Male   152          10109

title: get_comp_data — get_comp_data
text: Gets competition data WCA using ID provided.

title: get_comp_data — get_comp_data
code: get_comp_data(id, export_csv = FALSE, directory = NULL, file_name)

title: get_comp_data — get_comp_data
text: id ID competition searched . export_csv Whether data exported. Set false default. directory Directory .csv file saved. file_name File name .csv file.

title: get_person_data — get_person_data
text: Gets person data WCA website using ID provided.

title: get_person_data — get_person_data
code: get_person_data(id, export_csv = FALSE, directory = NULL, file_name)

title: get_person_data — get_person_data
text: id ID person searched. export_csv Whether data exported. Set false default. directory Directory .csv file saved. file_name File name .csv file.

title: get_record() — get_record
text: event Event record searched . Note use short version event name, e.g. 3x3 333, Square-1 sq1, region Region record search (World default)
